toolingFieldDefinition.Label: Allowance claimed prev period to date

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Date and time when the current Pay data for this Pay Run were generated
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Pay run generated date

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Payroll will be run using data as at this date. Note that when pay run is made final the date will be reset to the earlier of the pay run date or the pay period end date

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>xcdhcm__Pay_Period__c.xcdhcm__Late_reporting_reason__c</fullName> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Late reporting reason</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>A: Notional payment: Payment to Expat by third party or overseas employer</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>A: Notional payment: Payment to Expat by third party or overseas employer</label> </value> <value> <fullName>B: Notional payment: Employment related security</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>B: Notional payment: Employment related security</label> </value> <value> <fullName>C: Notional payment: Other</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>C: Notional payment: Other</label> </value> <value> <fullName>D: Payment subject to Class 1 NICs but P11D/P9D for tax</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>D: Payment subject to Class 1 NICs but P11D/P9D for tax</label> </value> <value> <fullName>E: Micro Employer using temporary "on or before" relaxation</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>E: Micro Employer using temporary "on or before" relaxation</label> </value> <value> <fullName>F: No requirement to maintain a Deductions Working Sheet or Impractical to report work done on the day</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>F: No requirement to maintain a Deductions Working Sheet or Impractical to report work done on the day</label> </value> <value> <fullName>G: Reasonable excuse</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>G: Reasonable excuse</label> </value> <value> <fullName>H: Correction to earlier submission</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>H: Correction to earlier submission</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Total payments to be made to HMRC as a result of this run. Includes tax, employer and employee NI and net of statutory pay recovery and employment allowance
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Total HMRC payments from employees
toolingEntityParticle.Name: xcdhcm__Total_HMRC_payments__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Total amounts deducted from employee pay to be paid out as court orders and attachments
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Total court orders
toolingEntityParticle.Name: xcdhcm__Total_attachments__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Total net pay due to be paid by the employer to employees for the pay run
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Total employee net pay
toolingEntityParticle.Name: xcdhcm__Total_employee_pay__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Total employer outgoings as a result of this pay run. Includes all payments: to employees, HMRC, student loans, courts and attachment orders and payments to benefit providers
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Total cost to employer
toolingEntityParticle.Name: xcdhcm__Total_outgoings__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>xcdhcm__Pay_Period__c.xcdhcm__Total_outgoings__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Total employer outgoings as a result of this pay run. Includes all payments: to employees; to HMRC (including student loans); to courts and attachment orders; and to benefit and pension providers</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>xcdhcm__Total_employee_pay__c + xcdhcm__Total_HMRC_payments_with_levy__c + xcdhcm__Total_attachments__c + xcdhcm__Benefit_contribution_this_period__c + xcdhcm__Pension_contribution_this_period__c</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <inlineHelpText>Total employer outgoings as a result of this pay run. Includes all payments: to employees, HMRC, student loans, courts and attachment orders and payments to benefit providers</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Total cost to employer</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>18</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>2</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Currency</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>xcdhcm__Pay_Period__c.xcdhcm__Statutory_recovery__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>used in the payments page, holds the statutory recovery of the period</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>xcdhcm__SAP_recovered_this_period__c + xcdhcm__ShPP_recovered_this_period__c + xcdhcm__SMP_recovered_this_period__c + xcdhcm__SPP_recovered_this_period__c</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Statutory recovery</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>18</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>2</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Number</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>xcdhcm__Pay_Period__c.xcdhcm__BACS_processing_day__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Used in code with the creation of the BACS file for the Processing day (working day before Payday)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>if( MOD(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c - DATE(1900,1,8), 7) = 0, xcdhcm__Pay_day__c - 3, xcdhcm__Pay_day__c -1)</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>BACS processing day</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Date</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>xcdhcm__Pay_Period__c.xcdhcm__EPS_status__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>HYPERLINK("/"&LEFT(xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c, FIND(",", xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c)-1), RIGHT(xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c, LEN(xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c) - FIND(",", xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c)))</formula> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>EPS status</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Total payments to be made to HMRC as a result of this run. Includes tax, employer and employee NI and net of statutory pay recovery, employment allowance and apprenticeship levy

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>xcdhcm__Pay_Period__c.xcdhcm__Total_HMRC_payments_with_levy__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>This formula field required due to levy value needs to include total HMRC payment.</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>NULLVALUE(xcdhcm__Total_HMRC_payments__c, 0.00) + NULLVALUE(xcdhcm__Estimated_levy_this_period__c, 0.00) - NULLVALUE( xcdhcm__Employment_allowance_this_period__c, 0.00)</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <inlineHelpText>Total payments to be made to HMRC as a result of this run. toolingEntityParticle.Label: Tax month

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>xcdhcm__Pay_Period__c.xcdhcm__Tax_month__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>MONTH(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) - 3/* Correct at end of tax year */+ IF( OR( MONTH(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) < 4, AND( MONTH(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) = 4, DAY(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) < 6)), 12, 0)/* Correct for first part of a month */- IF(DAY(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) < 6, 1, 0)</formula> <formulaTreatBlanksAs>BlankAsZero</formulaTreatBlanksAs> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Tax month</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>18</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Number</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>
